articles.title: Top Tech News Today: Realme Secretly Collecting User Data, Cheaper Uber Rides For Amazon Prime Members And More - ABP Live
articles.description: Realme is said to be collecting user data through its feature called Enhanced Intelligent Services, which is found under 'system settings' in Realme devices.

articles.title: Defence, critical tech on agenda as India's Modi heads to US for landmark visit - Reuters.com
articles.description: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi heads to the United States this week for a visit billed as a turning point for bilateral relations, with deeper cooperation in defence industry and sharing high technology in sharp focus.
